post_title: You are from Bratislava, around 20, you like music and would love to make a new friend? You might've found your candidate!

comments.author: jachcemmatnickspace
comments.body:
We are a rave crew going to 95 % of drum and bass raves in the city. This Friday next.

I can see from your username, this might not be your cup of tea.

But if you like skanking in a warehouse up to 4 am to dnb, dm me. Our moshpits are better;))))

comments.author: Palo_FishfaceGames
comments.body: Hey, how old are you exactly?

comments.author: ninjapotato94
comments.body: Down for clubbing this weekend? I‚Äôm solo travelling, from Norway and 30M. My ex gf dumped me but i already booked flight tickets. So yeah, i‚Äôll be alone in Bratislava from 19th-23rd. I‚Äôm down for anything, we can bars hopping first, meet new people and then go clubbing or something.

naah BA dnb raves are perfect for us, small events or big events, there is everything here

and nothing beats just getting out of the club / hall and being in bed in 20 minutes

comments.author: jachcemmatnickspace
comments.body:
ahh. You can follow either labels or clubs, but I only know DNB scene, not others

for example we are going here on Friday [https://www.instagram.com/p/DAoQY04tYqv/](https://www.instagram.com/p/DAoQY04tYqv/)

apart from Pulsation, also Masokombinat, Bassizm, Rezzonate, Bass Factory, Trident are very active labels in Bratislava. They either throw club nights, festivals or big 2000 people hall events.

for rave venues / clubs, check Wax2, Subdeck, Sundeck, Fuga, ≈†afko, Rados≈• and other clubs, they post events in advance for example on Instagram

there are other clubs in the city like Trafo, Channels, The Club and others but play generic pop / edm music
